improvements: Boost contrast to make subjects stand out more
Crop slightly to the left to center the flag and the standing worker more effectively
Sharpen the image, especially around the workers and the flag
critiques.notes: The image captures a powerful moment with good subject clarity. However, the exposure is a bit underexposed, leading to a somewhat flat appearance. Adjusting brightness and contrast would give the photo more punch and highlight the patriotic theme.

improvements: Increase contrast by 15-20% to enhance the separation between subjects and background
Apply selective sharpening to the workers and flag to improve detail clarity
Brighten the midtones by 10% to reveal more detail in the shadowed areas
Consider cropping slightly tighter to emphasize the workers while maintaining the flag's presence
critiques.notes: Strong documentary composition with good subject placement and narrative elements. The image effectively captures the patriotic working scene but suffers from slightly flat contrast typical of older photographs and could benefit from enhanced clarity to make the subjects pop more against the urban background.
